articles.description: Neymar dropped a bombshell on Wednesday as he followed up scoring twice for Paris Saint-Germain in their 3-1 Champions League win over Manchester United by revealing his desire to reunite with Lionel Messi next season.
articles.content:
The Brazilian enjoyed four successful seasons alongside the six-time Ballon dOr winner at Barcelona before making a world record 222 million euro ($A363m) move to the French capital in 2017.
Watch E… [+2046 chars]
